content:
# It appears that I am once again unable to insert Iron Ore into the Stone Furnace, as my inventory indicates that I have no Iron Ore available. 
# This suggests that the previous attempt to insert Iron Ore did not succeed, despite my inventory showing that I had harvested it.

# To resolve this, I will need to harvest more Iron Ore from the nearest Iron Ore patch. 
# First, I will locate the nearest Iron Ore resource patch and move to it.
nearest_iron_patch = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Get the position of the nearest Iron Ore patch.
move_to(nearest_iron_patch)  # Move to the Iron Ore patch for harvesting.

# After reaching the patch, I will harvest a sufficient amount of Iron Ore, around 10 units, so I can start smelting.
harvested_iron_amount = harvest_resource(nearest_iron_patch, quantity=10)  # Harvesting Iron Ore.

# Once the Iron Ore is harvested, I will check my inventory to confirm the amount of Iron Ore I have now.
print(f"Inventory after harvesting Iron Ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking inventory after harvesting Iron Ore.
